Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt7448180

Sinopse: French is a martial artist that takes on a job as a mob debt collector in order to make ends meet. He does whatever it takes to chase down individuals that owe money to Tommy until he meets a bartender that makes him question whether he should do the right thing. French needs money to pay off his debts and enlists his partner's help. French quickly finds out they can trust no one in this game.—anonymous
